Highlights of 2020 Government Work Report

Xi emphasizes strengthening national defense, armed forces

  • China expects positive GDP growth, achieving development goals
  • China confident of winning battle against poverty this year: premier
  • China, U.S. businesses need each other: premier
  • China, Japan, ROK working together to advance FTA development: premier
  • In pics: Chinese FM meets press on foreign policy, relations
  • Members of 13th National Committee of CPPCC give interviews via video link
